kit.leader_skill: STR Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Thunder Flash (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Otherworld Champion's Prestige
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) All enemies' DEF 50%; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: High chance of evading enemy's attack; For every Super Attack performed: (Forever) Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 20% up; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up (up to 50%); When the target enemy is in the following status: or: ATK 100% up; Before receiving an attack within the turn: Damage reduction rate 50% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Otherworld Warriors" or "Tournament Participants" Category characters: ATK & DEF 100% up; Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 20% up; Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
High chance of evading enemy's attack
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up (up to 50%)

lines.context: When the target enemy is in the following status: or
Before receiving an attack within the turn
When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Otherworld Warriors" or "Tournament Participants" Category characters
